verses.text: The word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* also came unto me, saying ,
Son of man , thou dwellest in the midst of a rebellious house , which have eyes to see , and see not; they have ears to hear , and hear not: for they \add are\add* a rebellious house.

Therefore, thou son of man , prepare thee stuff for removing , and remove by day in their sight ; and thou shalt remove from thy place to another place in their sight : it may be they will consider , though they \add be\add* a rebellious house.\f + \fr 12.3 \ft stuff: or, instruments\f*

Then shalt thou bring forth thy stuff by day in their sight , as stuff for removing : and thou shalt go forth at even in their sight , as they that go forth into captivity.\f + \fr 12.4 \ft as they…: Heb. as the goings forth of captivity\f*
Dig thou through the wall in their sight , and carry out thereby.\f + \fr 12.5 \ft Dig…: Heb. Dig for thee\f*

In their sight shalt thou bear \add it\add* upon \add thy\add* shoulders , \add and\add* carry \add it\add* forth in the twilight : thou shalt cover thy face , that thou see not the ground : for I have set thee \add for\add* a sign unto the house of Israel.

And I did so as I was commanded : I brought forth my stuff by day , as stuff for captivity , and in the even I digged through the wall with mine hand ; I brought \add it\add* forth in the twilight , \add and\add* I bare \add it\add* upon \add my\add* shoulder in their sight.\f + \fr 12.7 \ft digged: Heb. digged for me\f* \p
¶ And in the morning came the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto me, saying ,
Son of man , hath not the house of Israel , the rebellious house , said unto thee, What doest thou?
Say thou unto them, Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; This burden \add concerneth\add* the prince in Jerusalem , and all the house of Israel that \add are\add* among them.
Say , I \add am\add* your sign : like as I have done , so shall it be done unto them: they shall remove \add and\add* go into captivity.\f + \fr 12.11 \ft they…: Heb. by removing go into captivity\f*

And the prince that \add is\add* among them shall bear upon \add his\add* shoulder in the twilight , and shall go forth : they shall dig through the wall to carry out thereby: he shall cover his face , that he see not the ground with \add his\add* eyes.
My net also will I spread upon him, and he shall be taken in my snare : and I will bring him to Babylon \add to\add* the land of the Chaldeans ; yet shall he not see it, though he shall die there.
And I will scatter toward every wind all that \add are\add* about him to help him, and all his bands ; and I will draw out the sword after them.
And they shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I shall scatter them among the nations , and disperse them in the countries.

But I will leave a few men of them from the sword , from the famine , and from the pestilence ; that they may declare all their abominations among the heathen whither they come ; and they shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 12.16 \ft a few…: Heb. men of number\f* \p
¶ Moreover the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to me, saying ,
Son of man , eat thy bread with quaking , and drink thy water with trembling and with carefulness ;

And say unto the people of the land , Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* of the inhabitants of Jerusalem , \add and\add* of the land of Israel ; They shall eat their bread with carefulness , and drink their water with astonishment , that her land may be desolate from all that is therein , because of the violence of all them that dwell therein.\f + \fr 12.19 \ft all that…: Heb. the fulness thereof\f*
And the cities that are inhabited shall be laid waste , and the land shall be desolate ; and ye shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \p
¶ And the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,
Son of man , what \add is\add* that proverb \add that\add* ye have in the land of Israel , saying , The days are prolonged , and every vision faileth ?

Tell them therefore, Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will make this proverb to cease , and they shall no more use it as a proverb in Israel ; but say unto them, The days are at hand , and the effect of every vision.
For there shall be no more any vain vision nor flattering divination within the house of Israel.

For I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: I will speak , and the word that I shall speak shall come to pass ; it shall be no more prolonged : for in your days , O rebellious house , will I say the word , and will perform it, saith the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*. \p
¶ Again the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to me, saying ,
Son of man , behold, \add they of\add* the house of Israel say , The vision that he seeth \add is\add* for many days \add to come\add*, and he prophesieth of the times \add that are\add* far off.

Therefore say unto them, Thus saith the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; There shall none of my words be prolonged any more, but the word which I have spoken shall be done , saith the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*.
